Title: Outline for national agricultural construction for the years 1956-1967 (draft)
Notes: Provisions 17-20.17: Improving farming methods18: Eliminating the most serious insect pests and diseases that harm crops in all possible places (locusts, armyworms, rice borers, corn borers, cotton aphids, spider mites, red bollworms, wheat smut, wheat nematodes, sweet potato black spot)19: Reclaim wasteland and expand the area of cultivated land20: Develop state-owned farms
